metadata.title: Bulk RNA‑seq profiling of KAFO lines

params.text: Bulk RNA-seq of 54 KAFOs (19 AF samples; 18–34 weeks GA) showed expression of canonical development markers (LGR5, OLMF4, LRIG1 and SMOC2), Paneth (LYZ), goblet (MUC2 and CLCA1), endocrine (CHGA) and enterocyte (ALPI, FABP1, VIL1, EZR, KRT20 and ATP1A1) markers (Fig. 4a).
